concept.title: Trim and Extend Filleted Objects
concept.shortdesc: While performing fillet, you can select Trimoption to decide whether the selected edges are extended to the endpoints of fillet arcs. By default, all objects except circles, ellipses, closed polylines and splines are trimmed or extended when performing filleting.

conbody.p: When system variable TRIMMODE is set to 1, FILLET trims the intersecting lines to the endpoint of the fillet arc. If the lines do not get intersecting, thesystemextends or trims themto get intersecting.
